title: 2015년 Kelly Renee Gissendaner v. Commissioner, Georgia Department of Corrections 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Kelly Renee Gissendaner v. Commissioner, Georgia Department of Corrections. 판결일: 2015-07-24. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Kelly Renee GISSENDANER, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. COMMISSIONER, GEORGIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Warden, Defendants-Appellees
**판결일**: 2015-07-24
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Carnes, Jordan, Tjfolat

## 변호인

Lindsay Bennett, Federal Defender Program, Inc., Sacramento, CA, Susan C. Casey, Michael Kennedy McIntyre & Associates, Atlanta, GA, for Plaintiff-Appellant., Sabrina Graham, Beth Attaway Burton, Attorney General’s Office, Atlanta, GA, for Defendant-Appellee.

## 인용

- 794 F.3d 1327

## 판결문 요약

WARDEN,

                     for the Northern District of Georgia

                                 (July 24, 2015)

Before ED CARNES, Chief Judge, TJFOLAT and JORDAN, Circuit Judges.

ED CARNES, Chief Judge:
